archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.1.10b: b) deciding when to deploy patches, such as by assessing potential post-deployment impact to the organisation; determining the criticality of patches (e.g. using the Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS v3.1), Common Configuration Enumeration (CCE) or equivalent); and analysing the results of testing patches
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
